name: Bear, Vodka, Fall of Berlin!
storyline:
This time, Motherland sent you to fight against the Nazi forces to capture Berlin. . The game character is in the ruins of the city of Berlin. The streets are full of Nazis. You have unlimited ammo and a desire to end the war. Use the “V” KEY to drink vodka and replenish health.

Therefore, your main goal is to kill as many enemies as possible on the way to the Brandenburg Gate. The raid boss is waiting for you there. Killing him, you get to the Victory Parade in Moscow.
summary: This time, Motherland sent you to fight against the Nazi forces to capture Berlin. Kill enemies to get the maximum chance of survival.
